files.name: article-code-inline.component.html
files.content: <daff-article> <p>We could be discussing <code>functions</code> or <code>types</code>, but we should indicate the difference between these elements and regular text!</p> </daff-article>

files.name: article-code-inline.component.ts
files.content: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ // tslint:disable-next-line:component-selector selector: 'article-code-inline', templateUrl: './article-code-inline.component.html' }) export class ArticleCodeInlineComponent {}
